sentences.sContent: Since a name was considered an integral part of a person, it could be an effective target for sorcery.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since a name was considered an integral part of a person, it could be an effective target for sorcery.
sentences.sCn: 因为名字被认为是一个人的重要组成部分，就有可能成为巫术的有效攻击靶子。

sentences.sContent: Taking drugs that alter our state of mind is a form of sorcery, as are some forms of New Age healing/energy work.
sentences.sContent_eng: Taking drugs that alter our state of mind is a form of sorcery, as are some forms of New Age healing/energy work.
sentences.sCn: 吃药改变思想状态是巫术的一种形式，和一些新时期的康复治疗∕ 恢复能力是同样的形式。

sentences.sContent: In Papua, education about HIV is not widespread and many people still believe that sorcery is to blame for the growing number of cases each year.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Papua, education about HIV is not widespread and many people still believe that sorcery is to blame for the growing number of cases each year.
sentences.sCn: 对于艾滋病相关知识并没有得到广泛的普及。 人们依然认为巫术才是导致艾滋病数量逐年增多的元凶。
